member.name: M:Bam.Net.Automation.Data.DeferredJob.GetUniqueFilter
member.summary: Gets a query filter that should uniquely identify the current instance. The default implementation compares the Id/key field to the current instance's.

A WhereDelegate that recieves a BuildResultColumns and returns a IQueryFilter which is the result of any comparisons between BuildResultColumns and other values
Specifies what column and direction to order the results by

member.summary: A Worker that will attempt to build only the specified ProjectFileName. A recursive search will be done to find it, it may be either a .csproj file, .vbproj file or .sln file.
